programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Harvily Ever After / Let It Zo - Lucretia's wrapping up her Harvey Girls fan fiction podcast, but it's hard to say goodbye. Zoe's convinced that Audrey stole her bananarama baton.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Rupert & The Treasure Chest - An old Pirate tells Rupert he is searching for the treasure that will raise his sunken ship from the depths. How can Rupert help him?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Rupert & The Magic Show - When Ping Pong's glow-worm trick goes wrong, it's her rival Bill who ends up helping out… with spectacular results.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep23
programme.desc: They'Re Watching Us - After Birch watches a late night mockumentary on TV about aliens among us, she becomes a big ball of paranoia as she misinterprets her schoolmates' head twitches, hand gestures and overall comportment. What she doesn't know is they're planning a surprise party for her and are acting all mysterious around her.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep24
programme.desc: The Mascot - Liam is asked to help out the soccer team when an injury sidelines Raffi. Immediately thrilled to be part of the team — any team — Liam's joy turns to humiliation when he realizes the other players want him to be the mascot, not an actual player.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pig Trouble In Little Beanotown - When poor Gnasher is laid up wearing the 'collar of shame' Dennis takes Rasher to school instead and disguises her as an exchange student! What Dennis doesn't expect is that Walter will take a shine to the new girl! But once Walter realises the object of his affections is Rasher he is beyond embarrassed and hatches a revenge plan!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep24
programme.desc: I, Clawdia - I, Clawdia Walter and Clawdia are causing mischief for the gang by framing Gnasher for chewing things he shouldn't! It's only when the mayhem gets out of hand that Dennis smells a rat, or rather a cat! Dennis must catch Clawdia in the act and prove Gnasher's innocence before it's too late!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep12
programme.desc: Collection And Extraction - Team Voltron infiltrates a hidden Galra Space Station to investigate why Zarkon is attacking planets and siphoning the life energy from the universe

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep40
programme.desc: Return Of The Guapos Part 2 - Peabody and Sherman continue to make things right on their journey to stop an unlikely band of outlaws unleashed by the Guapos.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep38
programme.desc: Scaretrux - Revvit and the Reptools are trapped by Scraptors and create a fake T-Truxto scare them away, only to then have Skrap-It attempt to steal it

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep52
programme.desc: 137 Hours/Stalks On A Plane - Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Dennis And The Beanostalk: Part 1 - A massive Beanostalk transports all the Gang’s Christmas Stuff – and Gnasher – beyond the clouds to a Land of Giants! Dennis and the Gang bravely climb up to Ginormotown, determined to find Gnasher and bring Christmas back. On their quest they end up giving away all their christmas goodies, showing the Ginormotowners – and themselves what Christmas is really about!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Dennis And The Beanostalk: Part 2 - A massive Beanostalk transports all the Gang’s Christmas Stuff – and Gnasher – beyond the clouds to a Land of Giants! Dennis and the Gang bravely climb up to Ginormotown, determined to find Gnasher and bring Christmas back. On their quest they end up giving away all their christmas goodies, showing the Ginormotowners – and themselves what Christmas is really about!

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Shadows Of Bali - Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep18
programme.desc: Waltor / Out Foxed - When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep51
programme.desc: The Obelisk - When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep52
programme.desc: The Bloodwolf - When Puss is dealing with the apparent loss of Dulcinea, the mighty fear-eating Bloodwolf arrives and brings out Puss's greatest fears

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep51
programme.desc: I, Maurice - When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep52
programme.desc: Un-King Me - When the kingdom is overrun with refugees, Julien is shocked that an old friend Koto and his Mountain Lemur army are preparing to attack

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep25
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 1 - When they learn the Dragon Hunters are tracking the Flightmare, Hiccup and Astrid race to stop them after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn

programme.title: Dragons - Race To The Edge Ep26
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 2 - After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must develop a plan to outwit this dangerous new enemy

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep51
programme.desc: The Eternal Knight Pt. 1 - The Eternal Night covers Arcadia in shadow leading to a long awaited fight between the Trollhunter and Gunmar130226

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep52
programme.desc: The Eternal Knight Pt. 2 - To end the Eternal Night, Jim and the Trollhuntersmust risk everything in their battle against Gunmar.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep25
programme.desc: Sacks O' Cash / Oh Give Me A Home - Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep26
programme.desc: The Cloud / Booverty - Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep25
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Four - In an attempt to reverse Fearless Leader's goop-induced evil powers, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to an alternate reality to get an "anti-goop." Once there they discover opposite versions of everyone they know from the real world, including a NICE Boris and Natasha!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep26
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Five - It all comes down to this! With anti-goop in hand from the opposite dimension, Rocky and Bullwinkle set out to take away Fearless Leader’s super powers and save the world.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep2
programme.desc: Surprise (Us Epg) - Cleo tries to find her place at the Academy, unaware that Akila is planning a surprise birthday party for her.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep51
programme.desc: Can'T Hardly Bait / Crood Detente - After Womp is told he can't attend the upcoming school ceremony, Thunk makes it his personal mission to get Womp to pass every subject before the ceremony; When the Valleyites disagree with letting the Broods move to Ahhh! Valley, Grug throws a giant party to force them to become best friends

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep52
programme.desc: This Is An End Part 1 & 2 - With a big meteorite headed straight for Ahhh! Valley, Grug gathers a team to try and stop the rock before it destroys the valley while Ugga takes the rest of the family to go do the one thing they've always wanted to do in Ahhh! Valley before they evacuate

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Harvey Endings Part 1 / Harvey Endings Part 2 - Just as Richie reaches the end of his Childhood Immersion Checklist, the Harvey Street kids find out Lotta's leaving ... forever!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert & The Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert And The Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep25
programme.desc: Holiday Hijinx - There's no such thing as the perfect, simple gift for the members of the Pod 4. The kids over-think and over-plan their holiday gift giving until they've driven themselves — and each other — a little crazy.

programme.title: My Life Me Ep26
programme.desc: Rope Burn - When distracted spotter Birch turns away for a minute, Sandra falls and ends up twisting her ankle. Feeling immensely guilty, Birch offers her assistance, which Sandra promptly begins to take advantage. Suspecting she's being exploited, Birch sets Sandra up for a “big fall” in front of the whole school at a poetry slam.

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep77
programme.desc: Fifi'S Busy Day - Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep78
programme.desc: Dingaling Poppy - Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Postcards From The Veg - Pieface laments that Paul is looking peaky and needs a holiday. Dennis has a plan! But its only when Walter kidnaps Paul that he realises his chips are down and he needs to get the gangs help to put things right!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Whole Tooth - Gnasher gnashes Walters portrait so he retaliates with a titanium sausage leaving Gnasher toothless, miserable and without his mojo! Dennis and the gang will have to stage a heist to 'borrow' some diamonds until Gnasher's teeth grow back!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep13
programme.desc: The Black Paladin - Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck! If they're not rounded up, the Cat Show will be ruined.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters - Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival - Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. // Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food / Pups Save a Ferris Wheel - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Opening Ceremonies / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Adventure Bay Games - Marshall leads the pups when an underground fire threatens the Opening Ceremonies in this Ultimate Fire Rescue. // Chase and his police-pups must find the missing medals to save the Adventure Bay Games in this Ultimate Police Rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep712
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Pupmobiles - Mayor Goodway honors the Paw Patrol with the Key to the City. But Sid Swashbuckle and his trusty pirate pup Arrby swipe the key. Ryder calls for an Ultimate Rescue as the pups team up, Police style, to solve the mystery and stop those pesky pirates.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save a Swamp Creature / Ultimate Rescue: Pups and the Hidden Golden Bones - Something's gone wrong on the swamp tour. This Ultimate Rescue calls for Zuma and his Ultimate Swamp Vehicle! // Everything is shaking and breaking beneath Adventure Bay! Ryder will need Rocky to lead the pups on an Ultimate Fix-it Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Stop a Meltdown / Ultimate Rescue: Pups and the Mystery of the Missing Cellphones - It's a hot day in Adventure Bay and things are melting! The pups will need afire-pup power to cool things down. // Cell phones are vanishing all over adventure bay! The pups will need a lot of police power to solve this mystery and save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep514
programme.desc: ULTIMATE RESCUE: Pups Save the Tigers - When searching for elusive rumble top tigers, the Turbots fall into a cave deep inside a volcano. The Paw Patrol does a paratrooper style rescue from Skye's Ultimate copter in this Ultimate Aviator Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Royal Kitties - The Royal Kitties are kidnapped on their way to Adventure bay for a special visit. Ryder needs all the pups to help Chase investigate this case in an Ultimate Police Rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep906
programme.desc: Big Rig Rescue: Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sleepwalking Bear / Pups Save Dude Ranch Danny - The pups need to get a sleepwalking bear back home before he wakes up. // Daring Danny X takes his horse off the trail and ends up on a wild ride.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Hairy / Pups Save a Flying Kitty - Pups need to lure a big ape onto the PAW Patroller so they can take him back to the jungle. // Skye Kitty gets stuck beside an eagle's nest and needs help getting down.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Pups Party with Bats / Pups Save Sensei Yumi - Bats are drawn from their cave by DJ Rubble's new dance track. // A wind storm threatens unsuspecting Marshall and Sensei Yumi.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Kitties / Pups Save Tiny Marshall - The Kit-trastrophe crew get into the poufy shampoo and blow away. // Marshall dreams he gets shrunk.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Pups Chill Out / Pups Save Farmer Alex - Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch. // Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock / Pups Save a Good Mayor - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mail / Pups Save a Frog Mayor - The postman's truck gets stuck in the mud and the mail gets stuck in a tree. // Mayor Goodway turns into a frog.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Pups Save the Runaway Turtles / Pups Save the Shivering Sheep - Daring Danny X accidently drives off with turtle eggs. // Farmer Al's sheep runaway and Mayor Humdinger's kittens go missing.

programme.desc: Big Rig Rescue: Pups Stop a Flood - The Paw Patrol use their new Big Trucks and the help of their new pup pal Al to repair a dam before Adventure Bay is flooded.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pups Save Chicken Day - Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The Paw Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars - Katie is going to perform her contest winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Now it's up to the pups to find the special coconuut to reverse the spell. // Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep818
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Dozing Dragon - When the Duke and Claw use a magic cauldron to put the people of Barkingburg to sleep, their plan backfires when the enchanted fog works on Sparks, it's up to the Paw Patrol to wake up the Dragon along with everyone else in town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg / Pups Save Bedtime - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks. // The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save Breakfast - Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. // The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing from Carlos' archeological dig, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. // Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race, so the pups build him a mobility device.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! // Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Pups Save an Extreme Lunch / Pups Save a Cat Burglar - Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt! He is harnessed over a canyon eating an Extreme Lunch when the wind blows him upside down! // It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Pups Save the Butterflies / Pups Save an Underground Chicken - Chickaletta is stuck on a runaway drone and mysterious butterflies are causing chaos all around Adventure Bay! // The statue of Chickaletta has been stolen by Mayor Humdinger and is making its way through Adventure Bay's underground tunnel system.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep508
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile / Pups Save Heady Humdinger - When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride. // Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Pups Save the PawPaws / Pups Save a Popped Top - Carlos and Tracker make PawPaw juice with Paw Patrol when they find out Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta are in trouble. // The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off and he needs help saving his corn crop.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep818
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Dozing Dragon - When the Duke and Claw use a magic cauldron to put the people of Barkingburg to sleep, their plan backfires when the enchanted fog works on Sparks, it's up to the Paw Patrol to wake up the Dragon along with everyone else in town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Pups Save the Snowshoeing Goodways / Pups Save a Duck Pond - When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from a snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the Paw Patrol to search for them. // Water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the PAW Patrol find out what's happening!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself / Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snocat - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger. // Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's SnoCat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cuckoo Clock / Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Jake's family cuckoo clock and is sliding down the mountainside with Chickaletta stuck inside! Ryder calls on Everest to help the pups to save the day! // Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Pups Save a Frozen Camp-out / Pups Save the Fizzy Pickles - Alex and Mr. Porter are on a tropical Island camping trip when a freak snowstorm hits! // Mr. Porter is delivering his famous fizzy pickles to people around town when a bumpy road shakes up the deliveries and causes the pickle jars to POP.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pluck-O-Matic / Pups Save a Mascot - Yumi's new Robo- Corn Plucker goes haywire, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol must get it under control. // Daring Danny X, dressed as a "Bird X" mascot for the Adventure Bay, gets carried away by a couple of eagles who mistake him for one of their own!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Pups Save Ace's Birthday Surprise / Pups Save a Tower of Pizza - Adventure Bay is working hard to earn the record for having the world's highest tower of pizzas! // Rocky and the Pups are fixing an Old-Timey Junk Car for Ace Sorensen's Birthday!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save the Jungle Penguins / Pups Save a Freighter - An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home. // Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Melon Festival / Pups Save A Cow - Mayor Humdinger's plan to win the giant melon contest goes off the rails when his "melon" bounces away, causing chaos all over town! // When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey / Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm! // Mayor Goodway's purse has disappeared! Along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep815
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Quest for the Dragon's Tooth - When Ryder and the pups are knighted by the Princess of Barkingburg, they're put to the test when a disgruntled ex-Knight gains control of a dragon and attacks the castle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep818
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Dozing Dragon - When the Duke and Claw use a magic cauldron to put the people of Barkingburg to sleep, their plan backfires when the enchanted fog works on Sparks, it's up to the Paw Patrol to wake up the Dragon along with everyone else in town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep608
programme.desc: Pups Save Chickaletta's Egg / Pups Save Bedtime - Chickaletta has laid an egg, but it's rolled away and is heading through town. The Paw Patrol has to catch it before it breaks. // The Turbots are trapped somewhere in the jungle. They tried to call the Paw Patrol, but their phone cut out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Break the Ice / Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - Claw finds a way to make Sparks' breath icy and sets out to freeze all of Barkingburg. // When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save Breakfast - Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep51
programme.desc: The Fashion Badge - Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) Ep52
programme.desc: The Glasses Badge - When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help make his dreams come true?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep1
programme.desc: The Tooth Brushing Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath and teach him a special song to help him learn how to brush his teeth.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Geo Challenge - The Go Jetters test their knowledge and teamwork in a tricky maze full of trials. But can they escape the labyrinth, beat Glitch's high score and still keep the team together?

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Near and Far - Kit and Pup are pirates! Can you see if the treasure chest is near or far from the their pirate ship? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators try and get their beanbags nearest the target.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep9
programme.desc: Plate - Dee encourages a friend to say 'plate' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today's episode is all about plates!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep87
programme.desc: Lullaby - During Tiddlytubbies' Sleepybyes, RuRu is wide awake. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po take it in turns to sing him a lullaby.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep26
programme.desc: The Moon Whale - The Clangers hear a strange new sound coming from the sky - it is a Moon Whale, a rare and beautiful creature that none of them except Granny, has ever seen before.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: The Thing That Wanted To Fly - Gwen tells a baby bird she will teach it how to fly. The only problem is that she doesn't know how to herself!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: The Snow Po - The Kid Po have built a big and impressive Snow Po, but it keeps on blowing over. Can Team Tinpo help?

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep27
programme.desc: I Am Monty - Monty doesn't think he is similar to anyone else in his family and wonders whether everyone in a family should be alike.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: Hello Goodbye - Monty wonders if it is possible to feel both happy and sad at the same time.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep5
programme.desc: How Many More Minutes? - Long car journeys and rainy days can be pretty boring, but a dentist's waiting room is definitely the most boring place of all.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: I Am Collecting A Collection - Charlie is only missing one dinosaur for his immaculate collection, and it's the hardest one to get. Will he be able to find the Gigantasauras?

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Blown Together - It's a very windy day and Nelly and Nora have to work together to get home.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: Hot Foot - When the sand heats up, Nelly and Nora hot foot it around the beach.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep34
programme.desc: Toggle Tangle - After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) Ep35
programme.desc: Tummy Talk - When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S16) Ep17
programme.desc: Welcome Stafford - Spencer is on Sodor and is given the task of showing the new electric shunting engine, Stafford, around. Spencer puffs into Knapford station where he boasts to Thomas about his special task.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) Ep35
programme.desc: Dog Loves Enid Brighton - Pug wants to write exciting stories and our two friends meet Enid Brighton. She has a very vivid imagination and they go an adventure to solve all of her mysteries.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: The Duck Badge - The clubhouse is inundated with stray ducklings who think Norrie is their mum, so Duggee and the Squirrels need to do some detective work to reunite them with their real mum.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: The Day Off Badge - It's Duggee's Day Off but it's not long before the Squirrels show up to tell him about their adventures on their own days off... earning their Day Off badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: The Camouflage Badge - The Squirrels meet a chameleon called Cosey and learn about how to blend into their surroundings, earning their Camouflage Badges in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Stop Those Superweeds - Some fast-growing plants that don't belong on Academy Island are in danger of taking over. Can the Go Jetters stop the superweed from damaging the Academy and Grim HQ?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep35
programme.desc: The Blarney Stone, Ireland - Kyan has to use some smooth talking to save the tourists and protect Blarney Castle.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep36
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Around The World In 80 Days - It's a rainy day and the team are stuck inside, so Foz reads them his favourite book: Around the World in 80 Days by Jules Verne. The Go Jetters are soon imagining they are characters from the story.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: The Super Predator - What does it take to be the fiercest and most mighty super predator of all time? Young spinosaurus is on a quest to find out.

programme.title: Andy's Top 5 (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Backpack Finds - Andy reveals his top 5 Backpack Finds - with fascinating facts and jaw dropping facts to accompany the action.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Australopithecus & Hair - Andy travels back three million years where he tracks down the ancient tribe of australopithecus primates, but he has his trusty backpack stolen by hungry vultures.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep23
programme.desc: Mutiny - Gem and her teams of Swashbucklers try to win her jewels back from pirates Cook, Line and Sinker.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S3) Ep24
programme.desc: Maps the Way To Do It - Captain Sinker tries to teach Cook and Line how to map read by setting them a course to navigate in the cabin. Meanwhile, the Swashbucklers aim to win back all Gem's jewels.

programme.title: The Numtums (S1) Ep18
programme.desc: Mysterious Land Beyond Ten - Flinders agrees to take the Numpups to find the mysterious land beyond ten.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Bride Flights
programme.desc: The one-way ticket from Spain that changed Australian migration. The women came to work, but the real intention of the government was to balance the gender makeup of the Spanish community. These are some of the stories.

programme.title: AFLW Ep33
programme.desc: The Western Bulldogs take on the Geelong Cats in Round 6 of the Women's AFL.

programme.title: AFLW Ep34
programme.desc: St Kilda host Collingwood in Round 6 of the 2022 AFLW season.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep79
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and live coverage of events as they unfold. Plus comprehensive analysis, context and original investigations from ABC reporters around the world.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep21
programme.desc: One man's decade-long mission to expose the extent of an alarming chemical contamination scandal. Then, with no medical training, firefighter Mick Tisbury found an ingenious solution to help those who'd been exposed.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep40
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and live coverage of events as they unfold. Plus comprehensive analysis, context and original investigations from ABC reporters around the world.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - Kate Ritchie grew up in front of the nation. She was cast as Sally on Home and Away and played the role for two decades, with her own experiences reflected in her character. Anh must capture her warmth and authenticity.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Costa learns about weed labelling; Clarence repairs garden flood-damage; Josh shares tips to grow premium produce; Sophie focuses on fruit fly; Tammy shows how to construct a terrarium; we meet a passionate suburban grower.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Architect Domenic and his partner Sue are urban animals who love inner city suburb Surry Hills in Sydney. However, the suburb comes with a nightmare price tag so their solution is to buy small and build tall.

programme.title: Escape From The City Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - ABC Radio presenter Simon Marnie gives Sydney couple, Adrian and Kerby, a helping hand by taking them to view some stunning properties in the Southern Highlands, NSW, as they prepare for a career and lifestyle change.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep21
programme.desc: One man's decade-long mission to expose the extent of an alarming chemical contamination scandal. Then, with no medical training, firefighter Mick Tisbury found an ingenious solution to help those who'd been exposed.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep25
programme.desc: With an eye on the world this multiple award-winning show has been running since 1992, bringing you reports from around the globe, highlighting issues faced by different countries and looking at ways we can learn from them.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep32
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep79
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Australia's Oceans Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Southern Ocean is the only ocean that stretches unbroken around the globe. Aaron Pedersen examines how the cold southernmost waters, reaching from Australia to encircle the Antarctic, are rich and productive.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - High in the mountains of Timor-Leste, meet the first community in the Asia-Pacific region to successfully trade on the international carbon market. They are thriving, thanks to a chance friendship and a wife's undying love.

programme.title: Home And Away Ep163
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Bella struggles to deal with everyone's input. Ryder and Chloe are at opposites. Can Roo help Kieran?

programme.title: Home And Away Ep164
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Ziggy takes her frustration out on Tane. Chloe and Ryder find middle ground. Will Kieran be able to face Alf?

programme.title: Home And Away Ep165

We also meet a dancer who is using her art form to demand respect for modern working women. Plus, we discover the latest wedding trend in Uganda: Choreographed line dancing!

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: Shift 45/2021 - 3D printers cook up vegan steaks, robots bake pizzas and drones fly luxury foods out to yachts: how digitization is changing our eating and nutritional habits.

programme.title: REV
programme.desc: The Global Auto and Mobility Show - REV goes off-roading in the all-new Range Rover; discovers how Bogota is using electric cargo tricycles to curb congestion; tells you how to treat your EV battery; and gets a sneak peek at Uganda's first EV manufacturer.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: World Stories
programme.desc: The Week in Reports - The situation is still critical in many of the liberated parts of Ukraine. The Russian shelling continues, and people are suffering; the State Ballet in Berlin dances on the deck of a moving ship, a great challenge for the dancers.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: The Magazine for Africa's Youth - In this week’s show, Edith Kimani asks teen moms how pregnancy changed their lives. A teenage father in Kenya shares the struggles of parenting and we meet a young Namibian woman who escaped child marriage. We also meet a dancer who is using her art form to demand respect for modern working women. Plus, we discover the latest wedding trend in Uganda: Choreographed line dancing!

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Boom! - The Science of Explosives. Few discoveries have shaped the history of humanity as much as explosives. This science documentary focuses on the destructive and the positive powers of dynamite, TNT and their ilk.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: Chainsaw Queen - Alrun Uebing has a passion: cutting wood with an ax and with a chainsaw. Yes, it's a sport. Yes, it’s competitive. Uebing has been crowned European champion. And she’s broken a world record - for men. At the German Championships, the 49-year-old wants to win the last title that she hasn’t already won. Sports Life accompanies Alrun Uebing to the competition.

programme.title: Arts.21
programme.desc: Why Everyone Loves ABBA - ABBA’s songs have been played at parties for decades. The Swedish band made pop history and their catchy melodies completely redefined the concept of cool.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: Shift
programme.desc: Living in the Digital Age - Unique female influencers are becoming role models for many on social media: in fine form at over 80 years of age, fighting for the rights of Indigenous peoples, or excelling as truckers in a male-dominated industry.

programme.title: Faith Matters
programme.desc: Ulm Minster - The Tallest Church in the World. In the very center of Ulm, a city in southern Germany on the River Danube, stands the tallest church in the world. Its 161.53-metre-high steeple bears witness to the city’s glorious past as one of the most powerful and prosperous German cities in the Middle Ages.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Bhutan - The Dictatorship of Happiness. Bhutan is often presented as an ideal country. The kingdom is famous for its breathtaking nature, environmental awareness, and its inhabitants' happiness. But behind the facade lurks a darker reality.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: News

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
programme.desc: Prelims - With wins in five of her last six bouts, a stretch that has seen her defeat Tecia Torres and score Performance of the Night victories over Nina Nunes, Randa Markos and Hannah Cifers, Mackenzie Dern is on the verge of entering the strawweight title race, but to get there, she has to defeat China’s Yan Xiaonan in the main event of UFC Fight Night on October 1 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of wins over Angela Hill, Karolina Kowalkiewicz and Claudia Gadelha, Yan has proven to be a top contender at 115 pounds, but now she will meet her toughest test yet in the decorated jiu-jitsu black belt who is hungry to make her way to the top of the division

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Dern vs. Yan
programme.desc: Main Event - With wins in five of her last six bouts, a stretch that has seen her defeat Tecia Torres and score Performance of the Night victories over Nina Nunes, Randa Markos and Hannah Cifers, Mackenzie Dern is on the verge of entering the strawweight title race, but to get there, she has to defeat China’s Yan Xiaonan in the main event of UFC Fight Night on October 1 at the APEX in Las Vegas. Owner of wins over Angela Hill, Karolina Kowalkiewicz and Claudia Gadelha, Yan has proven to be a top contender at 115 pounds, but now she will meet her toughest test yet in the decorated jiu-jitsu black belt who is hungry to make her way to the top of the division
